title: Blank keys, big savings – type like a legend with these Das Keyboard Black Friday deals
author: john-loeffler
summary: Now's the time to treat yourself to the ultimate typing experience
article: The ultimate Black Friday sale is here for keyheads everywhere now that Das Keyboard is offering 15% off storewide through November 29 (as well as through Amazon). Think you can type? Prove it with the Das Keyboard 4 Ultimate for just $143.65 and master the label-less keycaps over either Cherry MX Brown or Cherry MX Blue switches for the ultimate typing experience. If that is a little too intense for your liking – or you just need a smaller tenkeyless model – grab the Das Keyboard 4C TKL for just $118.15.

There are plenty more where that came from, and with 15% off some of the best keyboards ever made, you can enjoy the best typing experience around for significantly less with these Black Friday deals.
(Not in the US? Scroll down for deals in your region).
Das Keyboard makes many of the best mechanical keyboards around, thanks to their quality construction, refined and comfortable keycaps, and choices of Cherry MX mechanical switches on many models.

We reviewed the Das Keyboard 4C TKL earlier this year and we absolutely fell in love with it, and we've been using the Das Keyboard 4 Professional for years now. Whatever you're going for, Das Keyboard makes a mechanical keyboard for you, and with 15% off, this Black Friday might just be the time to indulge yourself.
No matter where you live, you'll find all the lowest prices for Das Keyboard products from around the web right here, with offers available in your region.

headers.3: Today's best Das Keyboard Black Friday deals
